title: Enhancing HR Management Practical Competencies: Project-Based Flipped Cooking for Workplace Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of culinary tool usage and ingredient comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform ingredient measurement and preprocessing with over 85% accuracy through step-by-step cooking videos.
Teams can master 10 core recipes requiring over 90% success rates through hands-on practice.
Learners can create systematic presentation materials explaining cooking processes based on peer evaluations and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
